content: **from the description ** rippling layers of blues and greens make a soothing afghan that s perfect for relaxing any time of year **skill level ** easy **gauge ** measure one wave from top of one wave to top of the next wave - one wave = 4 5 / 11 5cm 5 row = 4 / 10cm over pattern using size i/9 5 5mm hook **materials ** pattern calls for - 728 yds / 2sk soft navy - 728 yds / 2sk windsor blue - 728 yds / 2sk country blue - 728 yds / 2sk dusty teal - 728 yds / 2sk frosty green
